name: MDL GF Rota

name: Integrations GF
description: The Integration GF rota, posts to #load-stream-share-pod-all
message:
Good morning! :wave: The following are on the Integrations Incidents Green Flag rota this week:
`Sprint is:` <<1>>
`Green Flags are:` <<2>> & <<3>>
`Squads involved are:` <<4>> & <<5>>

For any clashes between your planned leave and your rota days, make sure that you swap with someone who is available by updating the rota <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wiDQ3gi7-ixl-fYyX-Z6VBc9AHL-MqCEarT98_L98Uk/edit?gid=822553857#gid=822553857?usp=sharing|here>.
